title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE MUNICIPAL DEVELOPMENT COUNCIL (MDC) RESOLUTION NO. 2025-11 DATED OCTOBER 10,2025, ENTITLED ”RESOLUTION REPROGRAMMING CERTAIN PORTIONS OF THE 2096 MUNICIPAL DEVELOPMENT FUND CY 2025 CURRENT APPROPRIATIONS AMOUNTING TO THIRTEEN MILLION PESOS (PHP 13,000,000.00) FOR VARIOUS PURPOSES AND APPROVING THE SAME”. Author : Councilor Mike C. Pelegrina
